descriptionHtml:
This is a small Hat inspired by the MMO Ragnarok Online.

There are two versions in game. An unenchanted one for people who preffer adding their own. And one that gives +15% bow damage and +20 magicka. 

I created an optional droppable version that make any Skeleton Archers in game to have 20% chance of dropping them. 


[b]Installation[/b]:
Simply copy the Meshes folder and the esp from the archive into your Skyrim data folder and activate Apple-of-Archer.esp. 

If you want the droppable version, use the esp from the folder named Droppable. 

Lazy, but fastest way to get it in game, is to open the console with ` and type:
help apple 4
Find Apple of Archer and use the command player.additem

Apple of Archer       - xx000d64
Apple of Archer (E)  - xx000d66


To uninstall, delete Apple-of-Archer.esp and the  data\\meshes\\0hai\\Apple of Archer\\  folder. 



Everything in this mod use Vanilla Skyrim Model and Textures.
author: Caithe
